Package org.innoboon.utils

Class FileOperations

java.lang.Object
org.innoboon.utils.FileOperations
public class FileOperations extends Object
FileUtility class for processing CSV or JSON files and performing calculations.

  • Method Details

    • sum

      public static List<ResponseData> sum(List<File> files, String columnName)
      Calculates the sum of a specified column in each CSV or JSON file in the given list.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of CSV files.
      columnName - The name of the column for which the sum is calculated.
      Returns:
      A list of ResponseData objects containing the column name and the sum for each file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered.

    • average

      public static Map<String,Double> average(List<File> files, String columnName)
      Calculates the average of a specified column in each CSV or JSON file in the given list.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of CSV files.
      columnName - The name of the column for which the average is calculated.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and the average for each file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file type is encountered.

    • startsWith

      public static Map<String,List<String>> startsWith(List<File> files, String columnName, String prefix)
      Finds values in a specified column of CSV or JSON files that start with a given prefix.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files (CSV or JSON) to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to search for values.
      prefix - The prefix to check for in the values.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and a list of values starting with the specified prefix for each CSV file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file format is encountered.

    • endsWith

      public static Map<String,List<String>> endsWith(List<File> files, String columnName, String suffix)
      Finds values in a specified column of CSV or JSON files that end with a given suffix.
      Parameters:
      files - The list of files (CSV or JSON) to process.
      columnName - The name of the column to search for values.
      suffix - The suffix to check for in the values.
      Returns:
      A map containing the column name and a list of values ending with the specified suffix for each file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If an unsupported file format is encountered.
